zebra4j

Class PuzzleSolution

  • java.lang.Object
    • zebra4j.PuzzleSolution

  • @Immutable
public class PuzzleSolution
extends java.lang.Object
    A full solution to a BasicPuzzle

    Use PuzzleSolutionBuilder to create.

    See Also:
    PuzzleSolutionBuilder
